refnamediv.refpurpose: Change the directory to the given path.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Change the directory to the given path. This can change to a given folder in the current directory or change to a full path. Double periods (..) can also be used to go up one level. See also the pwd command.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: Change directory to the given folder located in the current directory.

example.title: Use cd to change the directory.

listitem.para: Changes the current directroy to a folder named test_folder that is located within the current directory.

refsection.para: Change directory to the given folder using the full path.

example.title: Use cd to change the directory.

listitem.para: Changes the current directroy to a folder named test_folder located at C:/geometry/test_folder.

refsection.para: Change directory to the folder above the current folder.

example.title: Use cd to change the directory.

listitem.para: Changes the current directroy to the folder above the current folder.
